title: Al Maguire
brief_description: Head coach Al Maguire has made Marquette University’s Warriors one of the most potent forces in college basketball. Maguire sees fear as motivating his own success and that of many others- fear of returning to some unsatisfactory situation one has been in- fear of losing the rewards of the present to some unknown situation.
